title: How do those who want to remain single for life stop thinking about that they’re different and that they are single? - Quora

response.answer_text: People who decide to be single throughout their lives do not think that they are not single. If someone is happy and satisfied being alone without the need for support or any interaction then it is their choice. ”I used to think that the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It’s not. The worst thing in life is ending up with people who make you feel all alone.” – Robin Williams Until you get comfortable with being alone, you’ll never know if you’re choosing someone out of love or loneliness.” – Mandy Hale
